radiographic_examinations.findings: less enhancing macroadenoma in the pituitary region
less enhancing mass lesion confirmed as PRL-secreting pituitary adenoma
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum PRL level decreased to about 2.4 mg/L 2 months later

radiographic_examinations.findings: likely parathyroid tumor of 12 mm in diameter

radiographic_examinations.findings: pancreatic tumor of 20 mm in diameter, confirmed as nonfunctioning endocrine tumor
enlargement of the sella turcica and destruction of the dorsum sella
anterior mediastinal tumor confirmed as thymic carcinoid tumor
well-defined solid mass with suprasellar extension in the pituitary gland

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Two years later, she remained asymptomatic

did not disclose any pancreatic tumors
